column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Josia ba Jehoiakim
column4: n'afe a otsia anan no mu no nna asɛm yi fi EWURADZE nkyɛn baa Jeremia hɔ

column2: "Fa nwoma mbobɔwee
column3: na kyerɛw nsɛm nyina a maka akyerɛ wo etsia Israel
column6: ofi da a mekasaa kyerɛɛ wo fi Josia ber do dze besi ndɛ da yi mpo."

column2: "Bi a Juda fi bɛtse mbusu nyina a mesua me tsir mu dɛ medze bɛyɛ hɔn; ama hɔn mu nyimpa biara ɔaasan efi no kwan bɔn do; ama medze hɔn emumuyɛ na hɔn bɔn aakyɛ hɔn."
"Nna Jeremia frɛɛ Neria ba Baruk; na Baruk kyerɛɛw EWURADZE nsɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ Jeremia nyina fir n'anomu hyɛɛ nwoma mbobɔwee no mu."
"Na Jeremia hyɛɛ Baruk
column4: Wɔatow me mu; murunntum nnkɔ EWURADZE fie:"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔwoara kɔ
column3: na kɛkenkan EWURADZE nsɛm a ekyerɛwee no
column5: wɔ mbuadadzi da no mu: na kenkan no wɔ Judafo nyina a wofi hɔn nkurow do ba no so asomu."

column2: "Bi a wɔdze hɔn nkotoserɛ bogu EWURADZE enyim
column3: na hɔn mu biara bɛsan efi no kwan bɔn no do: na ebufuw na ebufuhyew a EWURADZE aka egu ɔman yi do no ɔso."

column2: "Na Neria ba Baruk yɛɛ dɛ dza nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia hyɛɛ no no nyina
column3: na ɔkenkaan EWURADZE nsɛm no a ɔwɔ nwoma no mu no wɔ EWURADZE fie."

column2: "Afei ɔbaa dɛ Josua ba Jehoiakim
column5: wɔ bosoom a otsia akron no
column7: na nkorɔfo a wofi Juda mu baa Jerusalɛm nyina
column8: wɔbɔɔ mbuadadzi ho dawur wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Nna Baruk kenkaan Jeremia ne nsɛm a ɔwɔ nwoma no mu no wɔ EWURADZE fie
column3: wɔ ɔkyerɛwfo Safan ne ba Gemaria ne pia a ɔwɔ etsifi abangua no mu wɔ EWURADZE fie ɔponkɛse no ano

column2: "Na Safan ne ba Gemaria ne babanyin Mikaia tsee EWURADZE nsɛm a ɔwɔ nwoma no mu no nyina no
column4: "osianee kɔr ɔhen ne fie. Ɔkɔr ɔkyerɛwfo no ne pia no mu: na

column2: "Nna Mikaia kaa nsɛm a ɔtsee no ber a Baruk kenkaan nwoma no wɔ ɔman no asomu nyina kyerɛɛ hɔn."
"Dɛm ntsi asafohen no somaa Jehudi a ofi Kusi ebusua mu no wɔ Baruk hɔ
column4: Fa nwoma mbobɔwee no a akenkan mu nsɛm wɔ ɔman no asomu no kitsa wo nsamu bra. Nna Neria ba Baruk faa nwoma mbobɔwee no kitsaa ne nsamu na ɔbaa hɔn nkyɛn."

column2: "Na wɔsee no dɛ
column4: na kenkan no hɛn asomu. Nna Baruk kenkaan no hɔn asomu."

column2: "Afei ɔbaa dɛ
column3: wonyae tsee nsɛm no nyinara no
column6: Otwar dɛ yɛkɛka nsɛm yi nyina kyerɛ ɔhen."

column2: "Na wobisaa Baruk dɛ
column4: Isii dɛn kyerɛɛw nsɛm yi nyina? Ana ɔkae ma ekyerɛwee a?"

column2: "Nna Baruk buaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Ɔdze n'ano kaa nsɛm yi nyinara kyerɛɛ me
column4: na mo so medze dubir kyerɛwee guu nwoma mu."

column2: "Nna asafohen no see Baruk dɛ
column5: ɔwo na Jeremia; mma obiara nnhu mbrɛ hom wɔ."

column2: "Asafohen no dze nwoma mbobɔwee no siee ɔkyerɛwfo Elisama ne pia no mu; na wɔkɔr ɔhen no nkyɛn wɔ abangua no do; na wɔkaa nsɛm no nyina wɔ ɔhen no asomu."
"Nna ɔhen no somaa Jehudi dɛ ɔnkɛfa nwoma mbobɔwee no mbra: na okeyii no ɔkyerɛwfo Elisama ne pia no mu. Na Jehudi kenkanee kyerɛɛ ɔhen no na asafohen a wogyinagyina ɔhen no nkyɛn nyinara."
"Nna ɔhen tse awɔwber dan no mu
column3: wɔ bosoom a otsia akron no mu: na mbukyia mu ogya a ɔredzɛw taa n'enyim."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Jehudi wiee nkrataa ebiasa anaa anan kenkan no
column4: ɔhen no dze sekamba twitwae na ɔdze guu gya a ɔwɔ mbukyia mu no mu kesii dɛ nwoma mbobɔwee no nyina hyewee wɔ ogya a ɔwɔ mbukyia mu no."

column2: "Na woennsuro
"Mpo ber a Elnatan na Delaia na Gemaria totɔe serɛɛ ɔhen no dɛ nkyɛ mma ɔnnhyew nwoma mbobɔwee no: oenntsie hɔn."
"Na ɔhen no hyɛɛ ɔhenba Jerameel
column5: dɛ wɔnkɛkyer ɔkyerɛwfo Baruk na nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia: naaso EWURADZE dze hɔn sumae."

column2: "Afei ɔhen no hyeew nwoma mbobɔwee no a nsɛm a Baruk kyerɛwee fii Jeremia anomu wɔ mu no ekyir no
column7: na kyerɛw nkan nsɛm a ɔwɔ nwoma mbobɔwee a odzi kan no a Judahen Jehoiakim ahyew no no

column2: "Na ka wɔ Judahen Jehoiakim ho dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Ɔwo ahyew nwoma mbobɔwee yi
column5: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na akyerɛw no wɔ mu dɛ
column6: Babilɔnhen bɛba abɛsɛɛ asaase yi ampaara
column7: na ɔama nyimpa na abowa abɔ adze wɔ do?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE ka wɔ Judahen Jehoiakim ho nye yi: Onnkenya obi a ɔbɛtsena David akɔngua do: na no fun so wɔbɔtow akyen ma ɔhyew afa do ewiaber
"Na mebɛtsea ɔno na n'asefo na no nkowaa wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi
column3: na medze mbusu nyina a maka etsia hɔn no

column2: "Nna Jeremia faa nwoma mbobɔwee fofor so
column4: Neria ba no ɔno na ɔkyerɛɛw nwoma a Judahen Jehoiakim hyeew no wɔ gya mu no no mu nsɛm nyina fii Jeremia anomu hyɛɛ mu: na wɔdze nsɛm a ɔtsetse dɛm pii kekaa ho."
